Html:
Hello--
I just installed Wabbit on my MacBook Pro Retina, OS X 10.8. I used both the ROM image I created for back when I used TILEM, and also made a new ROM image after I found the problem, but no joy in fixing it.

If I load the ROM, the TI-84 Plus shows up on the screen, looks great. But using the mouse to try to click the buttons results in nonsense. The "clear" button inputs 1 on the screen, it doesn't clear it. Other buttons have similar weird effects. On the other hand, the same ROM image works fine on Wabbit on a Windows machine.

Update 10/2: noticed that when I changed the screen resolution to use a projector, the keys function properly. Is this perhaps a retina display incompatibility?

Update #2: okay, fixed my own problem. The application needs to be opened in low-resolution mode. See http://support.apple.com/kb/HT5266 for how to do this

Any help is appreciated,
Jeff
